mapper.select:
select
from e_salary_manage where salary_is_vaild = '1'
and student_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and teacher_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{teacherUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and student_user_id = #{studentUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and teacher_user_id = #{teacherUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and salary_class_id IN
#{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and salary_create_time >= str_to_date(#{startCreateTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and salary_create_time <= DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{endCreateTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by salary_create_time desc
